Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Enacts the whale awareness act
Summary: Enacts the whale awareness act directing the department of environmental conservation to establish recommendations and educational materials for reduction of marine mammal interactions.
LawCode: Add Art 13 Title 9 ยง13-0901, En Con L; amd ยง75, Nav L; amd ยง2251, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, the navigation law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting the whale awareness act
